title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Foster Care Forms (Social Services Law Section 383-C), form 383-c-2 - Order directing service in proceeding for approval of surrender instrument

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Foster Care Forms (Social Services Law Section 383-C), form 383-c-2 - Order directing service in proceeding for approval of surrender instrument

State Regulations

Soc.Serv. Law ยง 383-c Form 383-c-2
(Order Directing Service in Proceeding for

Approval of Surrender Instrument)
12/97

At a term of the Family Court of
the

State of New York, held in and for
the

County of, at, New York
on, 19. P R E S E N T: Hon. Judge
________
In the Matter of the Application for

Approval Docket No. of a Surrender Instrument

Concerning
ORDER DIRECTING
SERVICE OF NOTICE
Pursuant to Section 383-c of the

Social

Service Law
________
A petition requesting approval of an
instrument of surrender, dated the day of, 19, concerning, pursuant to section
383-c
of
the Social Services Law having been filed with this Court and it appearing that
notice should be given to the person(s) hereinafter named, it is hereby
ORDERED that notice of the hearing
together with a copy of the petition filed herein shall be served (personally)
(registered mail) (certified mail, return receipt requested) () upon the
following person(s) at least twenty days before the date set for such
hearing: ____________
____________
Form 383-c-2 Page 2
PURSUANT TO SECTION
1113
OF THE
FAMILY COURT ACT, AN APPEAL FROM THIS ORDER MUST BE TAKEN WITHIN 30 DAYS OF
RECEIPT OF THE ORDER BY APPELLANT IN COURT, 35 DAYS FROM THE DATE OF MAILING OF
THE ORDER TO APPELLANT BY THE CLERK OF COURT, OR 30 DAYS AFTER SERVICE BY A
PARTY OR THE LAW GUARDIAN UPON THE APPELLANT, WHICHEVER IS EARLIEST. ENTER
______________
J. F.C. Dated:, 19. Check applicable box: Order mailed on [specify date(s) and to
whom mailed]: Order received in court on [specify
date(s) and to whom given]:____________
Notes
